ResearchProjectDef.label: Droid Engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Provides access to the crafting of Outer Rim droids and items for them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Replacement Parts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of baseline replacement parts for droids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Overclocked Parts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of overclocked replacement parts for droids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Parts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of advanced replacement parts for droids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Energy Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of various energy modules for droids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weapon Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of various weapon modules for droids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of various shielding modules for droids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Assassin Droids
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks crafting of assassin droids, highly skilled in ranged combat. They also have rudimentary social skills.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Astromech Droids
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks crafting of astromech droids, they can typically perform repair, cleaning and hauling tasks, though their primary use is as a co-pilot in vehicles which have been designed to hold them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Battle Droids
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks crafting of battle droids, designed specifically for combat and little else.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Maintenance Droids
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks crafting of maintenance droids, these droids are typically capable of repair, hauling and cleaning tasks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medical Droids
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks crafting of medical droids, often purely capable of medical tasks and nothing else.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power Droids
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks crafting of Power Droid models, these droids are typically designed to function as portable fusion reactors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Protocol Droids
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks crafting of protocol droid models, typically designed for use as communication intermediaries and servants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Labor Droids
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks crafting of labor droids, usually designed to be capable of construction, mining and other labor intensive jobs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Security Droids
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks crafting of security droids, capable of at least basic combat and some rudimentary social skills allowing them to function as a warden.
